conversation.content: I need assistance with my loyalty account. I had twelve thousand points that are no longer showing.
Thank you for contacting us today. I'll be happy to investigate your loyalty points balance. May I have your membership number to access your account?
It's 4478-9021-3356. I last checked two weeks ago and everything was correct.
Perfect. I've located your account under membership 4478-9021-3356. I can see you currently show a balance of 482 points, but let me review your transaction history from the past 30 days.
Those points were accumulated over eighteen months. I was planning to redeem them for a flight upgrade.

I understand your concern. I'm seeing a debit transaction on November 12th at 2:47 PM for 11,518 points. The redemption code shows as RDM-7742-NK and appears to have been processed through our mobile app.
I didn't make any redemption on that date. Can you tell me what those points were used for?
Certainly.
I need this reversed immediately. This appears to be an unauthorized transaction on my account.

The points were redeemed for a digital gift card valued at $115.18 sent to an email address ending in gmail427. I'm escalating this to our fraud prevention team immediately under case number FRD-2024-11-8829.
That's not my email address. What steps are you taking to restore my points?

I've already initiated a full reversal. Your 11,518 points will be restored within 24 to 48 hours, and you'll receive confirmation at your registered email address. I'm also placing a security hold on your account to prevent further unauthorized access.
Good. Will I receive documentation showing this was fraudulent activity?

Absolutely. You'll receive a comprehensive fraud report under case FRD-2024-11-8829 within 5 business days. This will include all transaction details, the investigation findings, and confirmation of the point restoration.
What about the security of my account going forward? This shouldn't have been possible.

I agree completely. I'm implementing enhanced security protocol ES-7 on your account, which requires two-factor authentication for any redemption over 500 points. You'll also receive instant SMS alerts for all point transactions.
That's acceptable. Can you confirm when exactly I'll see the points restored to my balance?
Your points will be restored by November 16th at 11:59 PM Eastern Time. I've expedited your case to priority status P1, and you'll receive an SMS confirmation the moment the restoration is complete.
Thank you for handling this efficiently. I'll expect those confirmations and the fraud report.

You're very welcome. I've documented everything in your account and sent a detailed summary to your email. Our fraud team will contact you directly within 24 hours for any additional verification needed. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

scenario: trying to redeem loyalty points that seem to have disappeared
